## SpliceStrategy.splice() method

Performs and tracks a splice operation on an array.

**Signature:**

```typescript
splice(array: any[], observer: ArrayObserver, splice: typeof Array.prototype.splice, args: any[]): any;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

The operation to perform.


</td></tr>
